channel.title: devradar.io | manage your skills
channel.description: Recent content on devradar.io | manage your skills

item.title: concept
item.description: The devradar represents skills as so called blips that are rendered either on a radar-like graph or in a list.

item.title: Adding skills
item.description: All of the views have a floating button in the bottom right corner to add new blips to your devradar.

item.title: Tracking blip changes (blip history)
item.description: One crucial element when it comes to skill management is seeing how a certain skill evolves over time.

item.title: Changing blips and devradar metadata
item.description: There are two ways to change content after it has been saved: via the UI in List View, and via the Settings tab.

item.title: devradar Editor
item.description: Document and present skills for individuals and teams. The devradar editor allows you to:

item.title: devradar Teams (Alpha)
item.description: Import your team’s devradars, and track progress in your team members’ competencies.
